titles.title: Federal Small Businesses Contractor Prompt Payment Reporting Act
To require a report on accelerated payments to certain small business concerns, and for other purposes.
Federal Small Businesses Contractor Prompt Payment Reporting Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary:
Federal Small Businesses Contractor Prompt Payment Reporting Act
This bill requires each federal agency to report to Congress on the timeliness, including acceleration, of payments made to a prime contractor that is a small business or that subcontracts with a small business.
